name: SVLAN ID Preservation
title: SVP
definition: Identifies that the customer is requesting S-VLAN ID preservation on a requested OVC.
usageNotes: Optional when all RUIDs indicate an ENNI, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: Preservation means that the S-VLAN values provided to an OVC at the ingress ENNI will be retained and the same values will be handed off from the OVC at the egress ENNI.
